Description: On I-95 at mile marker 150.6 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On US-29 in the County of Culpeper, in the vicinity of the ramp from US 15; US 522, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 63.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
